name: Exciting Title
description:
Game made for a 2018 Hackathon.

Premise

The game is split into two parts a brawn section where they player must use quick reaction and timing to dodge projectiles and land on platforms, and the brain section where the player must use their wits to overcome puzzles. 

The Issue

At some point in the final hours of the project GitHub decided to revert back to an older version of the game without us knowing. Because of that half of our games are missing. What is posted here is what remains of this project. It was an ambition project from the start for a weekend with actual art and out scoped toolkit and abilities for the player. 

This is the final build we were able to put together. You can download an older build of the game that had a first draft of the missing level....

here: https://seanmany.github.io/excitingtitle.html

Credits

Stephen Lane - Design/ Programming

Tisha Boonyawatana - Design / Art

Sean Maguire - Design/ Programming
